attributes.action: Create a new tax and use the money to buy food for starving African children
attributes.additional_details: Overall, 5.6 million children under age five died in 2016, nearly 15,000 daily. The risk of a child dying before five years of age is highest in Africa - about 8 times higher than in Europe. Eventually if other countries from around the world put a tax on their goods too, this international tax money would help collapsed economies from around the world, so it would be like a world social security ensuring the world to be a safer world to live in for everyone.
attributes.background: Introduce a new tax and use the money to buy food for starving African children. I propose a small tax on all goods sold in England. The tax money will buy food for starving African children. Food security is very important, because when people have no money or food, eventually wars happen.
